titles.title: A bill for the relief of Sopuruchi Chukwueke.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

calendar.text: Committee on the Judiciary. Ordered to be reported with an amendment favorably.

action.text: Committee on the Judiciary. Reported by Senator Leahy with an amendment. Without written report.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 464.

vote.text: Passed Senate with an amendment by Unanimous Consent. (consideration: CR S5412-5413; text of measure as reported in Senate: CR S5412; text as passed Senate: CR 7/25/2012 S5623)

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Judiciary. H. Rept. 112-695.

calendar.text: Placed on the Private Calendar, Calendar No. 7.

action.text: Called up from the Private Calendar for consideration.
By request of Mr. Smith (TX) the House passed over the measure without prejudice.
Called up from the Private Calendar for consideration.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 2/3/2011--Introduced. Provides for the relief of Sopuruchi Chukwueke.
